quotes.text: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.text: When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: A two-year-old is kind of like having a blender, but you don't have a top for it.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld
